description:
Includes:
1 new training environment!
6 new backgrounds!

Bonus:
7 atmospheric music tracks.

A Certain Distance by Sean Williams
Can't Be Touched by Suraj Nepal
Lost in Space by Musical Mandalas
Stand Upright by Michael Shynes
Sweet Crop by Assaf Ayalon
Voyager Remix Version by Dear Gravity
White Dream by Yehezkel Raz

With Update 2.0, the game has reached a new and improved visual impact for a much more enjoyable and immersive experience!
name: Magic Atmosphere Pack 1
